Create a time series

Source: R/import_functions.R
create_timeseries.Rd

Cleans the data and turns it into time series structures ready for assessment

Usage

create_timeseries(
  ctsm.obj,
  determinands = ctsm_get_determinands(ctsm.obj$info),
  determinands.control = NULL,
  oddity_path = "oddities",
  return_early = FALSE,
  print_code_warnings = FALSE,
  get_basis = get_basis_default,
  normalise = FALSE,
  normalise.control = list()
)

Arguments

ctsm.obj

the CTSM object, as returned from tidy_data

determinands

the determinands to use, by default derived by calling ctsm_get_determinands, which takes values from the determinand reference table

determinands.control

determinands control values, when needed

oddity_path

a directory to write the oddities to

return_early

a boolean (default FALSE), if TRUE, returns early

print_code_warnings

a boolean (default FALSE)

get_basis

a basis function, by default get_basis_default

normalise

boolean or function, if TRUE, uses a default normalization

normalise.control

a list of control data for the normalization function

Value

a completed timeseries object, which can be used for assessments

On this page
